evidence.claim: Helion utilizes AWS for cloud services in their operations.
The company mentions support for FHIR and HL7 standards for healthcare data exchange on their developer page.
Documentation indicates compliance with HIPAA and mentions EDI transaction sets for healthcare data.
Helion uses Google Cloud for data management and processing needs.
The company highlights integration patterns involving EDI for healthcare workflows.

icp.icp_reason: Helion focuses on healthcare interoperability with X12 support and API integration.
